Description: Looking for an #employee of #Indian or #Pakistani nationality, aged between 25 and 30.for the position of #Warehouse Keeper in a factory.They should be proficient in Arabic and English languages and have a transferable residency permit.They should be ready to work in Yanbu, Saudi Arabia.Job description:Work in a control room environment using GPS Tracking System to detect, verify, and monitor events• Plan and manage Operations (Transportation, warehouse &distribution) •Maintaining, Vehicle Maintenance, Workshop supervision• Prepare documents for drivers route permits (Naql Bayan) & gate passes• Prepare weekly, monthly, semiannually & annually Reports• Preparing daily Cash, Store, Workshop Reports• Managing SECO (Saudi electric company) from Aramco.Managing Sabic Project.. Follow up Trucks and insure timely delivery of material to Customer• Preparing documents for Trucks (Istamara-Port Ids-MVPI- Insurance & Mezaan Card)⚫ Monitoring and tracking Trucks using GPS System⚫ Daily Monitoring trucks in workshop for timely Maintenance•Preparing Daily Maintenance Report, Journey Management form⚫Using TAMM Program for Trucks update (online Authorization)⚫Coordinating with Workshop Supervisor and Drivers for any Truck Breakdown or Maintenance⚫Monitor and respond to various information sources Drivers & Customers• Coordination with emergency agencies and respondentSkills
Skills:
Computer
English and arabic
transferable residency permit
